mapper.select: SELECT f_uid,f_username,f_realname,f_password,f_jurisdiction, f_ame_username,f_ame_password,f_ame_projectid,f_ame_taskid,f_mail FROM t_dr_user WHERE f_username = #{username} and f_password = #{password};
mapper.update: update t_dr_user set f_password = #{password} where f_uid = #{uid};
